Show:

ObjectiveFire Class

Defined in: src/objectiveFire.js:4

All classes should be registered in an instance of ObjectiveFire created at your Firebase.

Constructor

ObjectiveFire

(
  • ref
)

Defined in src/objectiveFire.js:4

Parameters:

  • ref Firebase

    Firebase object at the URL that is your Firebase. Provide a Firebase object - NOT a URL. This Firebase object may be a location in the Firebase - it doesn't have to be at the root. Doing as such will cause all objectivefire operations to be done from only within that location in the Firebase.

  • Index
  • Methods

Item Index

Methods

  • getByName
  • registerFromObject
  • registerFromObjectClass

Methods

getByName

(
  • name
)

Defined in src/objectiveFire.js:73

Gets registered class by name.

Parameters:

  • name String

    The name of the class.

Returns:

The class for the specified name.

registerFromObject

(
  • object
)

Defined in src/objectiveFire.js:34

Registers a class from an object that follows a specific format. The object must provided in this format. { name: name, // see ObjectClass documentation objectConstructor: objectConstructor, // see ObjectClass documentation objectMethods: { // see ObjectClass documentation a_method: function() {}, another_method: function() {} }, properties: { // see ObjectClass documentation a_primitive_property: {type: "primitive", name: "a_name"}, // these must match exactly an_object_property: {type: "object", name: "a_name", objectClassName: "a_class_name"}, an_object_array_property: {type: "objectArray", name: "a_name", objectClassName: "a_class_name"} } }

Parameters:

  • object Object

    The object from which to create the class.

Returns:

The registered class.

registerFromObjectClass

(
  • objectClass
)

Defined in src/objectiveFire.js:24

Registers a class from an ObjectClass object.

Parameters:

  • objectClass ObjectClass

    The ObjectClass from which to create the class.

Returns:

The registered class.
